challengeDescriptions.stretch_arm_fingers: Stretch one of your arms with your palm facing forward and pull your fingers up for 10 seconds per hand.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_arm_chest: Stretch your arm across your chest and pull it using your other arm for 10 seconds per arm.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_neck_sides: Pull your neck with the help of your hand to the right and left, holding the position for a few seconds.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_neck_back: With both hands on the back of your head, bring it down, stretching the back of the area.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_legs_cross: Cross your legs and go down with your hands stretched towards the floor. Repeat the movement with the other leg in front.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_legs_sitting: Sitting down, open your legs and try to touch your palms on the floor, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_knee_chest: Pull your knee to your chest and hold, switch legs after 10 seconds.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_sitting_twist: Sitting down, cross one leg and lean your torso forward, switch legs after 10 seconds.
challengeDescriptions.eye_palm_cover: Sitting down, close your eyes and cover them with the palms of your hands for 2 minutes, then open normally.
challengeDescriptions.eye_look_far: In an open environment, look as far as you can in four directions for 3s, move only your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
challengeDescriptions.eye_massage_brow: Using your thumbs, massage the area below your eyebrows in circular motions for 15 seconds.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_waist_twist: Standing up, twist your waist as much as you can to the left, hold for five seconds. Repeat to the right.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_shoulders_circles: Sitting down, make circular movements with your shoulders forward 5 times, then backward 5 times.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_wrist_rotation: Rotate your wrists in circular motions, 10 times each direction, helps prevent repetitive strain injuries.
challengeDescriptions.breathing_deep: Breathe in deeply through your nose counting to 4, hold for 4 seconds, exhale through your mouth counting to 4. Repeat 3 times.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_back_chair: Sitting in the chair, interlace your fingers behind your head, lean back stretching your back, hold for 10 seconds.
challengeDescriptions.eye_blink_exercise: Blink rapidly for 10 seconds, then close your eyes and relax for 10 seconds. Repeat 3 times.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_ankle_rotation: Sitting down, lift one foot and rotate the ankle 10 times in each direction. Switch feet and repeat.
challengeDescriptions.posture_correction: Sit upright, shoulders back, feet on the floor. Maintain this posture for 30 seconds breathing normally.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_triceps: Raise one arm, bend the elbow bringing your hand behind your head. With the other hand, pull the elbow. Hold 15 seconds and switch.
challengeDescriptions.eye_focus_near_far: Hold your thumb 10 inches from your eyes, focus on it for 5 seconds, then look at something distant for 5 seconds. Repeat 5 times.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_fingers_spread: Open and close your hands completely, then extend and spread all fingers to the maximum. Repeat 10 times.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_side_bend: Sitting down, raise one arm above your head and lean your body to the opposite side. Hold 10 seconds. Switch sides.
challengeDescriptions.eye_figure_eight: With your eyes, draw an imaginary figure 8 in the air slowly. Do 5 times in each direction.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_calf_raise: Standing up, hold onto a chair for support. Rise up on your toes, hold 3 seconds and lower. Repeat 15 times.
challengeDescriptions.breathing_box: Breathe counting: inhale (4s), hold (4s), exhale (4s), hold (4s). Complete 4 full cycles.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_forearm: Extend one arm forward, palm up. With the other hand, pull the fingers down. Hold 15 seconds and switch.
challengeDescriptions.eye_close_rest: Close your eyes gently and completely relax your facial muscles for 1 minute. Breathe calmly.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_shoulder_blade: Interlace your fingers and extend your arms forward, pushing your palms outward. Hold 15 seconds.
challengeDescriptions.stretch_neck_rotation: Slowly, rotate your head to the right until you feel a stretch, hold 5 seconds. Repeat to the left.
challengeDescriptions.hydration_reminder: Stand up and drink a glass of water. Staying hydrated is essential for concentration and health!
